enable_geoip.label: Auto detect user country using GeoIP

allowremoveproduct.label: Allow removing product in checkout page

disable_os.label: Disable Onestepcheckout on Smartphone
disable_os.comment: Comma seperated. For example: iphone,ipod,ipad,android,blackberry,webos,windows nt 6.1,windows xp

street_lines.label: Number of Lines in a Street Address
street_lines.comment: Leave empty for default (2). Valid range: 1-4

enable_giftmessage.label: Gift Message
enable_giftmessage.comment: please enable gift messages in configuration/Sale/Gift Messages!

options_sort.label: Sort Fields
options_sort.comment: Set the same position number if two fields are on the same line

allow_ajax.label: Ajax update checkout information when the customer

ajax_shippingmethod.label: Enable Update Shipping Methods
ajax_shippingmethod.comment: Update shipping methods when change address fields. Set No only if do not need reload shipping methods

ajax_paymentmethod.label: Enable Update Payment Methods
ajax_paymentmethod.comment: Update payment methods when change address fields. Set Yes only if need reload payment methods

ajax_shipping.label: Ajax Update for Shipping Methods
ajax_shipping.comment: Update order review when change shipping methods

ajax_payment.label: Ajax Update for Payment Methods
ajax_payment.comment: Update order review when change payment methods

asa_option.label: Show As soon as possible option

formatdate.label: Format Date
formatdate.comment: This format date will show in checkout page with customer

rangeday.label: Allow to show delivery period
rangeday.comment: Please input number of weeks. Display maximum time period for customer to choose delivery date.

disableday.label: National Holidays
disableday.comment: Enter off-shipping days with the format (mm/dd/yyyy), comma separated and no spaces

enableday.label: Additional Days
enableday.comment: Enter only weekend days with the format (mm/dd/yyyy), comma separated and no space

addtimerange.comment: Add Time Range with the format 24h (h:m), ex. 7:30

author_information.label: Author Information
author_information.comment: The onestepcheckout Extension is developed and supported by www.Mage-World.com. If you need any support or have any question please contact us at support@mage-world.com.
